mapper.insert: INSERT INTO favorite (id, account, update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{account}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM favorite WHERE id = #{id} AND account = #{account}
mapper.select: SELECT F.account, B.id, B.book_name AS bookName, B.book_text AS bookText, B.author, B.book_icon AS bookIcon, B.tag FROM favorite F LEFT JOIN book B ON B.id = F.id WHERE F.account = #{account} ORDER BY F.update_time DESC
